src_original: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇaparvatā meroḥ samā nāsya samā bhavanti /
eṣā hi dakṣiṇā proktā aprameye tathāgate /

samudrakalpe saṃbodhau sārthavāhe anuttare // iti /  teṣām etad abhavat* parinirvṛtasya tāvad bhagavataḥ kāraṇam iyat puṇyam uktaṃ bhagavatā /  tiṣṭhataḥ kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /  atha bhagavāṃs teṣām api cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
tiṣṭhantaṃ pūjayed yaś ca yaś cāpi parinirvṛtam* /
evaṃ hy acintiyā buddhā buddhadharmo 'py acintiyaḥ /
